title: Expenses and benefits: payments for time spent travelling

details.description: Tax and reporting rules for employers providing payments to employees for time spent travelling for work
details.alternative_title: Employers' tax and reporting for payments for employees' time spent travelling
details.body:
Payments to employees for time spent travelling count as earnings.

As an employer, you will need to:

  • add the payment to your employee’s other earnings
  • deduct and pay tax and Class 1 National Insurance through payroll

You won’t need to report these payments to HMRC.
